page.title: 12INDUSTRY
page.content: Croughton has its own area of small industrial units in Park End, housed in old RAF buildings, or in purpose built small workshop units. There is a garage with petrol pumps and workshop situated on the main road, with a Hire Service next door. The owners of the several small units within the estate have chosen Croughton for its low rates and running costs, but rents have risen steeply. Firms include a manufacturer of radios and record players, who employs a number of local people; car repair with car and skip hire; a printer's and a shoe factory, also employing a few locals. New larger warehouse units were built this year, and include the showroom of Croughton Antiques. A small furniture factory is located in the centre of the village.
